description: BIFURCATION CHAMPION — the bouncer [0,+1,-1,0,-1,+1] is perfectly still (DX=0, YAW=0). Reducing w24 by 0.1 (from +1.0 to +0.9) produces YAW=-188°. A 10% change in one synapse converts a stationary robot into a half-rotation spinner. The sharpest behavioral bifurcation in the zoo.
note: Parent config (5_bouncer) has DX=0, YAW=0, tilt=0. Delta: w24 changed by -0.1.
